title: The Earth Lord's School Life
description:
Description :
        The Earth's Most Powerful Being is always longing for a fight that would excite him.
Driven mad by his love for battle, he possesses the body of a high school student and once again experiences the thrill of combat.
Meanwhile, the Earth's Guardian, sealed away by other gods, seeks to grow stronger in his new body and challenge them.
Will he overcome the gods with his new body and continue to enjoy the thrill of battle?
